cab.content: Thio Pociimont io Property- cf His Britannic Nlaiest-Va government.*pa militavy^secret. 1006 157military^ecret.GJ. 7754 Vjj .From l7iceroy, Army Department, to Secretary of State for India,20th July 1919.(Repeated to Constantinople under No. 6272.)(Received 21st.)9772. 20th July..1. Malleson, 18th July: " Transcaspia. Front is still at Keliata. Bolshevicks said to be repairing railway. When contact is made Transcaspian troops will retire 10 miles daily while followed up. Their Armenians are unreliable, and Russian staff dare not risk further fighting."2. Report reached Malleson from Herat indicative that feeling against Bravin is increasing.-i-
